name: Arcane Gun
description:
Arcane Gun is a Sci-Fi Fantasy FPS game where the player battles waves of enemies using a combination of guns and magic abilities. Prove your worth by setting high scores and seeing if your friends can beat them.

This game is intended for teens and up.

Daniel Gaitan - movement, level design 

Sean McCarthy - models, animations, weapon system, UI, level design 

Rei Terasawa - AI, level design, enemy spawning 

Justin Kroh - Music
